title: 059: Arcanine
author: Chris Taylor
description:
A more majestic creature has never been seen. With nimble feet it moves at frightening speed. Far and wide is its’ gaze…it will set your soul ablaze…yeah that’s basically Arcanine.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Arcanine)
